required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Epidural Saline on Duration and Spread of Subsequent Spinal Analgesia/Anesthesia Using a CSE Technique

brief_summary.textblock: An attempt is being made to see if by injecting a set volume of sterile saline into the epidural space during the treatment of labor pain with a combined spinal/epidural (CSE) increases the amount of pain relief obtained and makes the labor analgesia lasts longer. Subjects are in the study from the time their CSE is placed until they request additional pain medication from the spinal dose of numbing medicine wearing off.

clinical_study.why_stopped: lack of subjects and manpower issues

primary_outcome.measure: Highest Sensory Blockade Level to Pinprick and to Cold
primary_outcome.description: Onset of analgesia to recession of analgesia. Highest spread of analgesia (highest sensory level) to cold temp and pinprick, with level defined from T1 to L5, where T1 is highest =level 17 and L5 is lowest =Level 1)

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Analgesia (Time to Request Additional Analgesia)
secondary_outcome.description: time of CSE to time request of additional supplement analgesia in minutes
time to VAS</=3 on a 0-10 scale with 0=no pain up to 10= worst pain imaginable

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Had Occurrence of Fetal Bradycardia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: length of labor, up to 24 hours
secondary_outcome.description: occurrence of common side effects of spinal/epidural administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Had Occurrence of Maternal Hypotension
secondary_outcome.time_frame: length of labor, up to 24 hours
length of labor, up to 24 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Had Occurrence of Itching
secondary_outcome.time_frame: length of labor, up to 24 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Had Occurrence of Post Dural Puncture Headache
secondary_outcome.time_frame: length of labor, up to 24 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Time for 2 Dermatome Level Regression of Sensory Block
Time for Regression of Motor Blockade

intervention.description: at time of epidural needle placement there will not be any saline injected into the epidural space prior to placement of the spinal needle to administer the CSE dose of standard analgesic medications. Instead a pause will be done as by the investigator to maintain blind for the assessor.

After the epidural needle is placed, 15 mls of sterile normal saline will be injected into the epidural space, then the spinal needle will be placed to administer the CSE dose of standard analgesic medications.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age greater than 12 years of age
- ASA status 1 or 2
- cervical dilation < 6cm
Exclusion Criteria:
- ASA assigned 3 or 4
- advanced labor (> 6cm cervical dilated)
- distorted epidural anatomy

facility.name: Forsyth Medical Center-Sara Lee Center for Women's Health

clinical_study.keyword: Analgesic duration with normal saline injection.
Analgesic duration without normal saline injection

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
